title: FK Atletas Kaunas
text: FK Atletas Kaunas (former:LKKA ir Teledema) was a <a href="Lithuania">Lithuania</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club from the city of <a href="Kaunas">Kaunas</a>. The majority of the players was recruited from the <a href="Lithuanian%20Academy%20of%20Physical%20Education">Lithuanian Academy of Physical Education</a>. LKKA ir Teledema earned promotion to the <a href="A%20Lyga">A Lyga</a>, Lithuanias top football division, for the <a href="A%20Lyga%202009">2009 season</a> after <a href="FBK%20Kaunas">FBK Kaunas</a> and <a href="FK%20Atlantas">Atlantas Klaipėda</a> voluntarily withdrew their participation. The team played in the A Lyga for the first time in the club's history.
